sentences.en: Ancient Greece was a fountain of wisdom and philosophy.
sentences.cn: 古希腊是智慧和哲学的发源地.

sentences.en: Annie's work reflects her philosophy that life is full of mysteries.
sentences.cn: 安妮的作品反映了她的人生哲学，即生活充满神秘色彩。

sentences.en: He believed in the philosophy of Russell.
He is a doctor of philosophy.
He received a doctorate of philosophy in political science at Columbia University.
sentences.cn: 他获哥伦比亚大学政治学博士学位.

sentences.en: He summed up his philosophy, with reference to Calvin.
sentences.cn: 他总结了自己的哲学，还提及了加尔文。

sentences.en: Her philosophy of life is to take every opportunity that presents itself.
sentences.cn: 她的处世态度是不放过任何呈现眼前的机会。

sentences.en: His interests extended beyond the fine arts to international politics and philosophy.
sentences.cn: 他兴趣广泛，涵盖了从美术到国际政治乃至哲学的各个领域。

sentences.en: I can't sum up his whole philosophy in one sentence.
sentences.cn: 我无法用一句话来概括他的全部人生观.

sentences.en: Philosophy is too deep for me.
sentences.cn: 哲学对我来说太深奥了.

sentences.en: the mechanistic philosophy that compares the brain to a computer
sentences.cn: 将人脑比作电脑的机械论哲学

sentences.en: The philosophy of them during their worst sufferings impressed even their captors.
sentences.cn: 他们在最困苦时仍处之泰然,连捉住他们的人都深有感触.

sentences.en: The philosophy of those long - hairs leans towards nihilism.
sentences.cn: 那些长发嬉皮士的人生观倾向于虚无主义.

sentences.en: This question comes into the domain of philosophy.
sentences.cn: 这一问题属于哲学范畴.

sentences.en: This veteran cadre still remains his philosophy of hard work and plain - living.
sentences.cn: 这位老干部仍然保持着艰苦朴素的作风.
